Summary: U.F.O accidently photographed in 2004 on fishing trip
trends: There have been no other sightings in san francisco bay
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailstwo pictures taken on may 10 2004 during a charter fishing trip. objects were apparently not visible to the naked eye but appeared clearly and in an extremely realistic fashion. one appearng and a tiered shaped craft with distorted "field" around it with another "ball-like" object nearby. possible observing for an unknown reason (object might appear to be a weight hanging off a pole but is not because the boat is in transit and the object is clearly above where a weight would normally hang..) second photograhph shows a curved like object that is clearly defined and extremely odd shaped, almoust like a boomerang. clearly reflective. (almost "surreal-looking") another "ball-like" object can be seen above the individuals head when zoomed it. used scanner w\ 1200 dpi for second photo and only about 600 for the first(which contains both photos). i have decided not to blot out the faces in the photograph to prevent the accusation of tampering. notes: in retrospect i did not feel "strange" during this time. why the objects only appear in the photographs i am in is unknown. blots on the emulsion can be most likely ruled out, especially conserning the second photograph in high resolution. anyone attempting to contact me should email me at :ghandivitamine@gmail.com (yes i know its silly) serious individuals only. i will not be interviewed under most circumstances. these photos are the only proof i need.feel free to discuss your opinion on the matter. all matters discussed with me are confidential.
